name: Bridge Ninja
description:
Classic gameplay with new graphics and elements!
The key concept is to save villagers from falling into the waters while walking over different broken bridges. 

Player controls a kind-hearted ninja, carrying a piece of wooden board to help cover the broken parts of the bridge so the villages will not fall into the waters.   Can you save all the villagers with only one wooden board?

We added characters into the game, some boost your scores, some are evil that you need to drop them to water, which adds to the complexity of the game and makes it more challenging for the player as they go through.

Artwork by:               Karl Hui          (karl.hui@gmail.com)
Programmed by:   Alex Leung   (alex50172860@hotmail.com)
